content: Hey @Mara -- I was going to poke at the blog post draft, but I don't think I have a link to the hackmd
@rylev do you have one?
the only link I have is the "published" one that doesn't permit edits
@nikomatsakis oh it's on github now: https://github.com/rust-lang/blog.rust-lang.org/compare/master...m-ou-se:plan-2021
@Mara do you mind if i try to make some edits now?
(don't want to step on your toes if you are editing)
sure. i'll give you write access to my fork
thanks
@nikomatsakis are you making more edits?
@Mara ack! I have some edits yes
I can push
I got distracted by #project-const-generics meeting
no rush. but if you're close to finishing your edits, i can finish the thing after dinner. :)
pushed
one more push :)
ok, done for now
Looks good. But isn't the ## What comes next? part as it is now more something for the Inside Rust blog post?
@nikomatsakis ^

@Mara the lints section looks good. I don't think there's much to add for the main blog post, but we might want to add more detail for the internals blog post since there's been questions on why we've only done these two lints.

We might want to remove the part from the post about adding more lint -> error conversions. We've been through all the lints and have decided to only upgrade these two lints. It is possible that might change, but it's unlikely IMO

rylev said:

Mara the lints section looks good. I don't think there's much to add for the main blog post, but we might want to add more detail for the internals blog post since there's been questions on why we've only done these two lints.

yeah, that should go here at some point: https://github.com/rust-lang/blog.rust-lang.org/compare/master...m-ou-se:plan-2021#diff-a8c379cdff0c2f525765fcbc802969dd0ca1dec4075b71871e26b0e7197a2396R34-R39
@Mara I could I suppose go either way; i thought that the "what comes next" seemed like stuff that end-users might care about, but maybe it's too detailed.

rylev said:

We might want to remove the part from the post about adding more lint -> error conversions. We've been through all the lints and have decided to only upgrade these two lints. It is possible that might change, but it's unlikely IMO

sounds fine
probably we could remove some of those deadlines
I guess I mostly wanted to say "the next blog post you can expect is a call for testing'

PR with the post for the main blog: https://github.com/rust-lang/blog.rust-lang.org/pull/825
cc @nikomatsakis @rylev
@Mara awesome!
